createPool().details: Assigns a unique ID and sets the creator.

params._durationSeconds: The duration of the voting period in seconds from now.
params._imageLink: A URL link to an image for the proposal.
params._poolId: The ID of the pool this proposal is linked to.

deposit(uint256).details: Requires the pool to exist. Increases the pool's balance.

params._poolId: The ID of the pool to deposit into.

executeProposal(uint256).details: Checks results, marks as executed, and transfers pool funds if passed. Can be called by anyone after the deadline. Uses ReentrancyGuard.

params._proposalId: The ID of the proposal to execute.

returns._0: bool True if the address has voted, false otherwise.

vote(uint256,bool).details: Checks for proposal existence, deadline, and prevents double voting.

params._proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.

createProposal(uint256,string,string,str.notice: Creates a new proposal associated with an existing pool.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits ETH into a specific pool.

executeProposal(uint256).notice: Executes a proposal after its deadline has passed.

getHasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Checks if a specific address has voted on a specific proposal.

getPool(uint256).notice: Gets the details of a specific pool.

getProposal(uint256).notice: Gets the details of a specific proposal.

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Cast a vote on a specific proposal.
